title: President Obama and the 21st Century Cures Act

content.question: After reading the scenario, please respond to A, B, and C below. Referencing the scenario, describe the party control of government when the 21st Century Cures Act was passed and explain how that party control could have affected the process by which the bill described above became a law. Referencing the scenario, explain why a Democratic senator following the trustee model of representation might have cast a vote against this bill. Describe another part of the executive branch, other than the president, that could affect this legislation after its passage. Explain how that part of the executive branch might affect the success of this legislation.
